name: Re∞Birth
description:
⟡ Intro ⟡

Jūsuke is a boy who shares his body with the spirit of an ancient sword. Together they spend nights fighting and absorbing spirits to grow stronger. Jūsuke just wants to have fun; Sword just wants to satisfy his hunger. Problem is, there are powerful spirits who start to take notice of what Jūsuke and Sword are doing, and aren't going to just leave them alone.

⟡ Details ⟡

Language: English

Studio: Milky Cherry

Genre: Visual Novel, BL (shota/feminine boys), Fantasy Action

Engine: Ren'Py

Platforms: Mac, Windows, Linux

This VN is PG14 by default, which means it contains fantasy combat and injury, character death, a little gore, and implied sexuality.

Optional 18+ content can be enabled/disabled in the preferences screen.

⟡

- Non-commercial

- 15k words

- 800x600 Resolution

- 4 endings

- 2 romances

- Game code files available

⟡ Staff ⟡

Writing, Coding - Isa Natsumachi

Sprites - Kirsch Yamagata

※ Due to technical difficulties the sprites are still in placeholder form

Background photos, music, and sounds are sourced from free-use or Creative Commons sources.

That also means that this game is licensed under Creative Commons:

Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike

⟡ Extra ⟡

- Soundtrack download
